comment: * Base columns for tables that contain MMSs.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_ALL
variables.comment: Message box: all messages.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_INBOX
variables.comment: Message box: inbox.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_SENT
variables.comment: Message box: sent messages.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_DRAFTS
variables.comment: Message box: drafts.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_OUTBOX
variables.comment: Message box: outbox.

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX_FAILED
variables.comment: Message box: failed.

variables.name: THREAD_ID
variables.comment:
* The thread ID of the message. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: DATE
variables.comment:
* The date the message was received. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: DATE_SENT
variables.comment:
* The date the message was sent. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: MESSAGE_BOX
variables.comment:
* The box which the message belongs to, e.g. {@link #MESSAGE_BOX_INBOX}. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: READ
variables.comment:
* Has the message been read? *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: SEEN
variables.comment:
* Has the message been seen by the user? The "seen" flag determines * whether we need to show a new message notification. *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: TEXT_ONLY
variables.comment:
* Does the message have only a text part (can also have a subject) with * no picture, slideshow, sound, etc. parts? *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: MESSAGE_ID
variables.comment:
* The {@code Message-ID} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: SUBJECT
variables.comment:
* The subject of the message, if present. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: SUBJECT_CHARSET
variables.comment:
* The character set of the subject, if present. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment:
* The {@code Content-Type} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: CONTENT_LOCATION
variables.comment:
* The {@code Content-Location} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: EXPIRY
variables.comment:
* The expiry time of the message. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: MESSAGE_CLASS
variables.comment:
* The class of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: MESSAGE_TYPE
variables.comment:
* The type of the message defined by MMS spec. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: MMS_VERSION
variables.comment:
* The version of the specification that this message conforms to. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: MESSAGE_SIZE
variables.comment:
* The size of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: PRIORITY
variables.comment:
* The priority of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: READ_REPORT
variables.comment:
* The {@code read-report} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: REPORT_ALLOWED
variables.comment:
* Is read report allowed? *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: RESPONSE_STATUS
variables.comment:
* The {@code response-status} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: STATUS
variables.comment:
* The {@code status} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: TRANSACTION_ID
variables.comment:
* The {@code transaction-id} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: RETRIEVE_STATUS
variables.comment:
* The {@code retrieve-status} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: RETRIEVE_TEXT
variables.comment:
* The {@code retrieve-text} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: RETRIEVE_TEXT_CHARSET
variables.comment:
* The character set of the retrieve-text. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: READ_STATUS
variables.comment:
* The {@code read-status} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: CONTENT_CLASS
variables.comment:
* The {@code content-class} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: DELIVERY_REPORT
variables.comment:
* The {@code delivery-report} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: DELIVERY_TIME_TOKEN
variables.comment:
* The {@code delivery-time-token} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

* @deprecated this column is no longer supported. * @hide

variables.name: DELIVERY_TIME
variables.comment:
* The {@code delivery-time} of the message. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: RESPONSE_TEXT
variables.comment:
* The {@code response-text} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: SENDER_VISIBILITY
variables.comment:
* The {@code sender-visibility} of the message. *

Type: TEXT

* @deprecated this column is no longer supported. * @hide

variables.name: REPLY_CHARGING
variables.comment:

Type: INTEGER

* The {@code mbox-quotas} of the message. *

variables.name: LOCKED
variables.comment:
* Is the message locked? *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: SUBSCRIPTION_ID
variables.comment:
* The subscription to which the message belongs to. Its value will be * < 0 if the sub id cannot be determined. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment:
* The identity of the sender of a sent message. It is * usually the package name of the app which sends the message. *

Note: * This column is read-only. It is set by the provider and can not be changed by apps. *

Type: TEXT
